item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 28, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 1,156 Questions Censored by DeepSeek (225 points | 131 comments)
2. New speculative attacks on Apple CPUs (508 points | 183 comments)
3. DeepSeek's Multi-head latent attention and other KV cache tricks explained (47 points | 3 comments)
4. Boom XB-1 First Supersonic Flight [video] (325 points | 249 comments)
5. Can we get the benefits of transitive dependencies without undermining security? (49 points | 37 comments)
6. Job Trends of HN Who is hiring? (12 points | 8 comments)
7. TokenVerse: Multi-Concept Personalization in Token Modulation Space by Google (40 points | 4 comments)
8. Maxima in the browser using Embedded Common Lisp on WASM (157 points | 38 comments)
9. AI haters build tarpits to trap and trick AI scrapers that ignore robots.txt (37 points | 26 comments)
10. SciPhi (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
11. Using uv as your shebang line (215 points | 81 comments)
12. IAC confirms existence of a Super-earth in the habitable zone of a Sun-like Star (203 points | 156 comments)
13. Promising results from DeepSeek R1 for code (687 points | 496 comments)
14. Parkinsons patient "feels cured" with new adaptive deep brain stimulation device (112 points | 12 comments)
15. Malimite – iOS and macOS Decompiler (64 points | 4 comments)
16. The History of Toontown’s SpeedChat (13 points | 1 comment)
17. What's OAuth2, Anyway? (41 points | 9 comments)
18. Slicing the Fourth (9 points | discuss)
19. A new ability to pinpoint sources of fast radio bursts (28 points | 1 comment)
20. FTC takes action against GoDaddy for alleged lax data security (209 points | 96 comments)
21. Run DeepSeek R1 Dynamic 1.58-bit (663 points | 296 comments)
22. Machine learning and nano-3D printing produce nano-architected materials (15 points | 2 comments)
23. Old Games Magazines (55 points | 21 comments)
24. Watch the path of a raindrop from anywhere in the world (50 points | 20 comments)
25. Desmos Animated Graphing Calculator (139 points | 19 comments)
26. Keycloak, Angular, and the BFF Pattern (31 points | 11 comments)
27. Show HN: Meelo, self-hosted music server for collectors and music maniacs (53 points | 10 comments)
28. We're bringing Pebble back (2556 points | 658 comments)
29. Public Access OpenVMS System (72 points | 34 comments)
30. Svelte 5 and the Future of Frameworks: A Chat with Rich Harris (63 points | 15 comments)
